channel.title: How to add a new command?
channel.description:
hello i was looking for a command that you can use just one time. something like ::4fjjsue838k that add's an item or points and when it's used you get an message that the code is already used. i saw this somewhere but i can't find it anymore.
anyone know how to?

item.title: How to add a new command?
item.dc:creator: @I_need_a_username I need a username
item.description:
@I_need_a_username wrote:

First of all, i dont think that would be a command itself
you would need a command and then type that afterwards Eg:

::Redeem 4fjjsue838k
To get that command see this tut:
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,434617.0.html

Read full topic
item.source: How to add a new command?
